metadata.title: CVE-2023-26144 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package graphql from 16.3.0 and before 16.8.1 arevulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) due to insufficient checks in theOverlappingFieldsCanBeMergedRule.ts file when parsing large queries. Thisvulnerability allows an attacker to degrade system performance. **Note:**It was not proven that this vulnerability can crash the process.

criterions.comment: node-graphql package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
